title: Encar Vehicle Parser - Input
description: Parse Encar vehicle detail pages by vehicleId or a list of vehicleIds. Optionally use a saved HTML file for offline runs.

vehicleId.title: Vehicle ID
vehicleId.description: Single Encar vehicleId to parse (e.g., 40849700). Leave empty if using vehicleIds instead.

vehicleIds.title: Vehicle IDs
vehicleIds.description: List of Encar vehicleIds to parse.

htmlPath.title: Local HTML path
htmlPath.description: Optional path to a saved Encar detail page for offline parsing.

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Parallel fetches to run (capped to 10 to avoid overloading Encar/Apify).
